summary: PROBLEMS WITH FRONT LOWER CONTROL ARMS AND DEFECTIVE PULLEY IN ENGINE. *MR  THE FUEL PUMP WAS REPLACED AT 17000 MILES.  THE AIR CONDITIONER WOULD BLOW WARM AIR INTERMITTENTLY.  THE DEALER HAS APPEMPTED TO REPAIR THE A/C SEVERAL TIMES BUT HAS NIT BEEN SUCCESSFUL.  *NM
